subject: Radio Show Tonight on PTN---One foot out of the grave-(1 hr away)
author: urkel23@aol.com
full_text:
--part1_f3f33.32615a74.3a566a26_boundary
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit


I will be on PTN as a guest tonight discussing paranormal stuff  and
box work. The show is Jeff and Nancy Rezman's "One Foot Out of The  Grave". 
An
award winning program with interactive topics and  chat.

Here's the info you need:

Please join us this Wednesday  night 9-11 est or 8-10 cst on
www.paranormaltvnetwork.com for our show  OneFootOutOfTheGrave. Our special
guest is Steve Hultay. Steve is a  researcher with ghost boxes and 
developed his
own box called the STEVE'S BOX.  Steve has been doing this for many years 
and had
a lot of success with his  research. We will be doing a live ghost box 
session
with Steve and one of his  new boxes. So please join in with our 
interactive chat
room and call in with  questions for the ghost box.

One Foot Out Of The Grave has a new channel  on the 
www.paranormaltvnetwork.com.
Just go to the upper left side of the  home page and click on ONE FOOT OUT 
OF THE
GRAVE and it will take you right  into our channel.


Hope to see you guys in attendance,

-Steve  H.



Steve Hultay
_www.keyportparanormal.com_ (http://www.keyportparanormal.com/) 
_http://tech.groups.yahoo.com/group/rtsc/_ 
(http://tech.groups.yahoo.com/group/rtsc/) 
_www.stevehultay.com_ (http://www.stevehultay.com/) 
_www.rtscresearch.org_ (http://www.rtscresearch.org/)
